intro: Pasania lysistachya, commonly known as the slender pasania, is a flowering plant native to parts of Asia, including China and India. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its delicate, elongated leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks. Pasania lysistachya is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
